subject.description: Young adult female, tanned olive skin, long red ponytail hair parted center.
subject.attire: Orange one-piece swimsuit, extreme deep plunging V to navel, high-cut legs, halter top.

anatomy.bust_details: Large prominent bust, natural heavy sag, forward projection, deep cleavage.
anatomy.skin_texture: Smooth tanned skin, visible collarbones, soft highlights.

pose.arms: Arms extended sideways, hands flat on stone rim.
pose.head: Head straight, facing camera.
pose.gaze: Direct eye contact, soft intense expression.

environment.foreground: Bubbling hot tub, grey-blue water, grey stone rim.
environment.background: Snow-covered pines, log cabins with warm window lights.

camera.perspective: Moderate depth of field, soft background.

lighting: Soft diffuse overcast daylight, subtle wet skin highlights, balanced cool/warm tones.

mood_and_expression.expression: Calm confident, neutral to slight pout.

style_and_realism: Photorealistic lifestyle, high-fidelity, physically accurate, no stylization.
negative_prompt: small bust, reduced volume, flattened breasts, lifted breasts, slimmed torso, proportion averaging, beautification, skin smoothing, plastic skin, stylization
